entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 12:58 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.8°C

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
